name: Signature Ceramic Mug
description: Start your day with a sip of happiness from our classic ceramic mug. Features our signature logo and a comfortable handle. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Classic Logo T-Shirt
description: Wear your love for baking with our premium quality t-shirt. Made from 100% soft, breathable cotton. Unisex fit, available in S, M, L, XL.

name: Everyday Canvas Tote Bag
description: Carry your groceries, books, or fresh pastries in our sturdy and stylish tote bag. Made from heavy-duty canvas with reinforced handles for durability.

name: Insulated Travel Tumbler
description: Keep your coffee hot or your iced tea cold for hours. Our sleek, stainless steel travel tumbler features double-wall insulation and a spill-resistant lid.

name: Signature Embroidered Cap
description: Top off your look with our classic baseball cap. Made from high-quality cotton twill, it features our logo beautifully embroidered on the front and an adjustable strap for a perfect fit.
